posts.post_title: FS: N28 A & G Chas Bennett PSA 1.5 $800
posts.post_content:
For sale is this N28 Allen & Ginter Chas Bennett PSA 1.5. Card has a nice looking front, no creases, decent corners, and glue residue with paper loss on back. Front displays better than technical grade.

$800 shipped

Price includes shipping. Payment via Paypal 'FF/Gift' or price plus 3% for regular Paypal ONLY. Please PM me to buy or with questions. Thanks.........Matt
